main event: A radar-only UFO sighting was recorded in Beloit, Wisconsin on April 18, 1962.
interesting points: The object was tracked for 7 minutes on radar without visual confirmation,It appeared as a solid return on the radar screen,The object disappeared at an altitude of 10,000 feet,The weather was clear with visible stars during the observation,This sighting was part of data collected under the Project Blue Book initiative.
witness description: the sighting was recorded only on radar, no visual witnesses
